Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ActionPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionPhase
  • public class ActionPhase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will handle the actions of the players ( Move, Move and Grab, Shoot, frenzyMove, FrenzyGrab, FrenzyShoot)

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      • grab

        private void grab​(java.lang.String newWeaponName,
                  java.lang.String discardedWeaponName,
                  java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> toSell)
        This method does the grab action
        Parameters:
        newWeaponName - is the name of the weapon to buy
        discardedWeaponName - is the name of the weapon to discard
        toSell - list of CachedPowerUps to sell to pay the weapon instead of ammos

      • checkGrabMove

        private java.lang.Boolean checkGrabMove​(GrabAction grabAction)
        This method will check if the player can do the specified moves
        Parameters:
        grabAction - is the class containing the list of moves
        Returns:
        true if the moves are legal or false otherwise

      • checkGrab

        private java.lang.Boolean checkGrab​(java.lang.String newWeaponName,
                                    java.lang.String discardedWeaponName,
                                    Cell cell,
                                    java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUpList)
        this method will check if the player can grab in the specified cell
        Parameters:
        newWeaponName - is the name of the weapon to buy
        discardedWeaponName - is the name of the weapon to discard
        cell - is the specified cell
        powerUpList - list of powerups list which the user will discard to pay instead of ammos
        Returns:
        true if the player can grab false otherwise

      • checkWeaponGrab

        private java.lang.Boolean checkWeaponGrab​(java.lang.String newWeaponName,
                                          java.lang.String discardedWeaponName,
                                          Cell cell,
                                          java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUpList)
        this method will check if the player can grab a weapon in the specified cell
        Parameters:
        newWeaponName - is the name of the weapon to buy
        discardedWeaponName - is the name of the weapon to discard
        cell - is the specified cell
        powerUpList - list of cachedpowerups which the user wants to discard to pay the weapom buy cost
        Returns:
        true if the player can grab false otherwise

                                                    java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUpList)
        Parameters:
        weapon - is the weapon to buy
        powerUpList - list of cachedpowerups which the user wants to discard to pay the weapom buy cost
        Returns:
        true if the player can buy it

        This method will check if the player can pay the buy cost with the parameters he specified
        Parameters:
        ammoCubeList - is a list of ammoCubes
        weapon - is the weapon to buy
        Returns:
        true if yes, false otherwise

      • shootAction

        public void shootAction​(ShootAction shootAction)
        This method will make the player do a "shoot" action
        Parameters:
        shootAction - is the class containing the list of moves

      • shoot

        private void shoot​(ShootAction shootAction)
            throws WeaponNotLoadedException,
                   PlayerAlreadyDeadException,
                   PlayerInSameCellException,
                   PlayerInDifferentCellException,
                   UncorrectDistanceException,
                   SeeAblePlayerException,
                   UncorrectEffectsException,
                   NotCorrectPlayerNumberException,
                   PlayerNotSeeableException,
                   WeaponNotFoundException,
                   DifferentPlayerNeededException,
                   NotEnoughAmmoException,
                   CardNotPossessedException,
                   ArgsNotValidatedException,
                   CellNonExistentException,
                   PrecedentPlayerNeededException
        This method will do the atomic action shoot forward exception if them are thrown in shoot
        Parameters:
        shootAction - is the class containing the list of moves
        Throws:
        WeaponNotLoadedException
        PlayerAlreadyDeadException
        PlayerInSameCellException
        PlayerInDifferentCellException
        UncorrectDistanceException
        SeeAblePlayerException
        UncorrectEffectsException
        NotCorrectPlayerNumberException
        PlayerNotSeeableException
        WeaponNotFoundException
        DifferentPlayerNeededException
        NotEnoughAmmoException
        CardNotPossessedException
        ArgsNotValidatedException - if the controller checks fails
        CellNonExistentException
        PrecedentPlayerNeededException
        PlayerAlreadyDeadException
        SeeAblePlayerException
        UncorrectEffectsException
        NotCorrectPlayerNumberException
        PlayerNotSeeableException
        WeaponNotFoundException
        DifferentPlayerNeededException
        NotEnoughAmmoException
        CardNotPossessedException
        CellNonExistentException

      • shootFailed

        private void shootFailed​(ShootAction shootAction,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> shotPlayerThisTurnBackup)
        This method will restore the player original position if the shoot failed and restore the shotPlayer list
        Parameters:
        shootAction - is the class containing all the details of the shoot requested
        shotPlayerThisTurnBackup - is the backup list of the shotPlayer, saved before the shoot attempt

      • checkShoot

        private java.lang.Boolean checkShoot​(ShootAction shootAction)
        This method will check if the parameter the player specified are suitable for shooting
        Parameters:
        shootAction - is the class containing the list of moves
        Returns:
        true if the action is doable

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • discardPowerUpShoot

        private java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> discardPowerUpShoot​(java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> cachedPowerUpList)
                                                   throws CardNotPossessedException
        This method is used to sell PowerUp
        Parameters:
        cachedPowerUpList - is the list of cachedPowerUp to sell
        Returns:
        a list of remained powerUp to sell
        Throws:
        CardNotPossessedException - if a powerUp is not found

      • restoreSellPowerUp

        private void restoreSellPowerUp()
        This method uses the list of PowerUp discarded prior to shoot to restore the initial values if something went wrong
